title: What are your views on the power of imagination? - Quora

response.answer_text: The purported “power of bland imagination” is only a piece of wishful thinking. You can’t push your imagination ahead without attending to its causality. “Imagination” has five factors. “Intuition” and “volume of knowledge” are the apparent ones. The other three, the latent and remoter ones, are “solidarity of emotions”, “solidarity of knowledge” and “the dream”. “Intuition” is the faculty of visualization, i.e. the faculty of looking forward. However, it needs to be “powered”, “directed” and “authenticated”. The power comes from consistency of existing cumulative emotions which has been referred to above as solidarity of emotions. The cumulative emotions are collectively known as the subconscious. So, solidarity of emotion could be also described as subconscious solidarity or subconscious stability. This empowers intuition. What directs (gives the right direction to) intuition is a special spiritual proclivity called “dreaming spirituality” or simply, “dream”. This is a psycho-intellectual proclivity that is begotten of visualization and acknowledgement of the “universal twin goals”. These are the mutually-corroborative two universal goals, the first one being “physical evolution”/ “macro-evolution” and the second one, “subjective happiness”/ evolutionary happiness. Intuition finds its right direction under the inspirational traction of the dreaming spirituality. The dream also consolidates the individual emotions and the subconscious as a whole. Knowledge is derived from perceptional memories coming from direct perceptions such as geographical and social interactions or indirect perceptions such as studies, cultural wisdom etc. “Self-confidence” and “veracity” gives it solidarity. Dream plays the great role of invigorating the neural activities by instilling confidence into the perceptions on one hand and of invigorating the intellectual process by instilling epistemic veracity into the intellectual products viz. ideas and inferences. “Perceptional self-confidence” and “epistemic veracity” bring about the “epistemic solidarity” which has been taken as one of the factors. Imagination becomes maximal in volume and optimal in quality when these five factors are taken care of.
